attributes.additional_details:
Chilcot enquiry is paramount.  I advocate that we should refuse to take part in the next General Election until this 5+ year old enquiry is published. If the present Government and the rest of the political community need to move the date of the next election, then they can easily change the date and if necessary change the constitution.
The public, and more importantly the soldiers and families who sacrificed their lives for the country, need closure. This report surely overrides the need for a regular election. Otherwise, shame on all the parties and none of you deserve my vote.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition title: Publish the Chilcott Enquiry before the General Election 2015

Created by: Stuart long

Closing: 30/03/2015
